nodes.text: Changeling or Shapeshifter was a term used for those species, such as the Shi'ido or the Clawdites, with the ability to change their appearance or shape.
Because of the mistrust some beings had of shapeshifters, they would often try to hide their species of origin. Others were valued as assassins, spies, and observers.
Some beings were also able to transform through the Force by using the reflections of the life forces around them. Those species included the Force wielders.
